description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国汉族政治人物，曾任中国大唐集团办公厅主任，是中国共产党党员，并担任第十一届全国人民代表大会黑龙江地区代表。
description.en: A Han Chinese politician from the People's Republic of China, who served as the Director of the General Office of China Datang Corporation, is a member of the Communist Party of China, and was a delegate for the Heilongjiang region to the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国直辖市。
description.en: A municipality directly under the Central Government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通常简称为中国。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一家大型国有电力企业集团。
description.en: A large state-owned power generation enterprise group in China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 第十一届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十一届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 华北电力大学的前身之一，中国的一所高等教育机构。
description.en: One of the predecessors of North China Electric Power University, an institution of higher education in China.
Wang Xin is a native of Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 王欣担任中国大唐集团办公厅主任。
description.en: Wang Xin served as the Director of the General Office of China Datang Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 王欣是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Wang Xin is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 第十一届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2008年起，王欣担任第十一届全国人民代表大会黑龙江地区代表。
description.en: Starting from 2008, Wang Xin served as a delegate for the Heilongjiang region to the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 王欣毕业于华北电力学院热动专业。
description.en: Wang Xin graduated from North China Electric Power College, majoring in Thermal Power.
